descriptionHtml:
Fully retextured dragonbone armor for male.  I gave the armor more of a battle worn look, like from getting blasted by fire and ice with a slight polish and some metal reinforcement lining the bones.

I plan on retexturing the rest of the dragon armor line like scale and female versions, this was a personal project.. but hey I figured I\'d upload it here .. I enjoy it .. probably someone out there might enjoy it aswell.

Retextured Items: helm,body,gloves,boots and shield

Installation: 
Data>textures>armor>dragonbone  
or 
just use Nexus Mod Manager
author: Alpha-Skull
